author: Ross Burden
method: Place the sesame oil, honey and soy sauce into a bowl and mix together.  Add the mushrooms and leave to marinate for ten minutes. Heat a griddle pan until smoking. Thread the mushrooms onto skewers and place onto the griddle to cook for two minutes on each side. To serve, place a Savoy cabbage leaf on the base of a plate and top with the mushroom skewers.
ingredients: 2 tbsp sesame oil ,  2 tbsp soy sauce ,  2 tbsp honey,  12 button mushrooms, stems removed,  1 Savoy cabbage leaf, to garnish
